data.title: Conference on Tomorrow's Chemicals Policy: Perspectives and Challenges
data.meta_description: Belgian presidency Council of the European Union
data.meta_site_name: Conference on Tomorrow's Chemicals Policy: Perspectives and Challenges
data.text:
In the context of the Belgian presidency, the FPS Health, Food chain safety and Environment will host a conference on 'Tomorrow's Chemicals Policy: Perspectives and Challenges'.

This event will be the opportunity to assess the progress of chemicals policy at European and global level:

What have we achieved implementing the European Chemical Strategy for Sustainability (CSS Communication - 2020)?

What are the objectives not yet attained, and what needs to be done to advance towards a toxic-free environment?

What have we agreed upon at the global level (Global Framework on Chemicals)?

What resources and assets do we need to keep up this ambition in the coming years?

How to ensure a sustainable and competitive industry while safeguarding the planetary boundaries?

Bringing together experts, scientists, members of civil society, and industry representatives, this event will explore the current landscape of chemicals policy. The different speakers and stakeholders will try to identify today's major challenges and tomorrow's opportunities.

When? April 23rd (full day) and 24th (AM) 2024.

The conference will be held in English (no translation will be provided). Stay tuned for more details on the event.
